headline: Will Tariffs & EVs Destroy This Top Stock's Bottom Line in 2026?
summary: While tariff complications and EV profitability will continue to weigh on bottom lines, this automaker is still driving strong results.

headline: Did GM’s Big Buybacks, Dividend Hike and 2026 Guidance Just Shift General Motors’ (GM) Investment Narrative?
summary: In late January 2026, General Motors reported full-year 2025 results, announced higher earnings guidance for 2026, raised its quarterly dividend to US$0.18 per share, and completed a share repurchase of 212,652,988 shares for about US$11.67 billion while authorizing an additional US$6 billion buyback. Together, the guidance, dividend increase, and large-scale buybacks highlight management’s confidence in cash generation and a focus on rewarding shareholders even as the company realigns its...

headline: Automakers Retreat From 2026 Super Bowl Advertising as Market Uncertainty Grows
summary: Automakers are largely sitting out of Super Bowl 60 advertising, reflecting broader uncertainty in the US automotive industry.
